attributes.action: Ban the use of mobile phones in the garden in the early hours of the morning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My neighbour's are regularly out in the garden at 2AM or 3AM on mobile phones. I have been advised by the police and local authority there is nothing that can be done to stop them. I think something needs to be done to change this.  If they play loud music they can be prosecuted but, noise nuisance by mobiles is just as stressful when your tired and can't sleep.
